name: Final Fantasy XIV: Endwalker - Collector's Edition
summary:
This edition includes the following:

- Final Fantasy XIV: Endwalker
- Endwalker Special Art Box
- Expertly Crafted Paladin Figure
- Endwalker Art Collection & Frame Set
- Azem Pin
- Loporrit Mini Plush
- Bonus In-game content: (Arion Mount, Wind-up Porom Minion & Death Scythe)
